value.title: Differences between Power BI Apps and Workspaces
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you the difference between Power Bi Apps and workspaces and what do I use them for. I also explain why I think that workspaces are too messy for the business user or data consumer.  Links to resources mentioned in the video: The new App Navigation video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Bo0HHUcuas

value.title: Dynamically add missing columns in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to add missing columns if they are missing in Power Query so your queries wont break.  Link to the resource: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/87affbc4-364f-470a-80ee-c35d32f1d331/is-there-a-way-to-add-a-column-only-if-it-doesnt-already-exist?forum=powerquery

value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: How to add ANNOTATIONS to a chart in Power BI to provide an explanation or more context!

In todays video I will show you can you can add annotations to charts automatically

Enjoy"  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
